title: Stark Report: Left-Right Divide Is At Its Worst In Recent Memory
teaser: Michael Dimock, the Pew Research Center's  vice president of research, discusses Pew's latest polls, which show that Republicans and Democrats are more divided along ideological lines than at any point in the last two decades.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
